caption.title: Forecasted changes (2080) in (A) black spruce habitat, (B) balsam fir habitat, (C) white birch habitat, (D) yellow birch habitat and (E) sugar maple habitat.
caption.p: UH: unsuitable habitat; LSH: persistent but less suitable habitat; PH: persistent habitat. Confidence values were calculated as the percentage of the 560 single predictions for a given cell that agreed with the average prediction for that cell. Values ≤ 50%: poor; 50% < values ≤ 75%: medium; values > 75%: high.
